946547925840211968.text: And so begins a whole new cycle of White House reporters asking if he really means this and staff dodging the question while diplomats try to work around this with other countries.https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/946531657229701120 …

946577609248464902.text: Why is the question “does he really mean this?” (because, really, who cares?) and not “what does the administration say to the victims of global warming in California, Texas, and Florida?” I mean, come on!

946597748798869504.text: Yeah, that was never the question I had planned while I was in the briefing room. More—does he acknowledge sea-level rise, will the federal government plan for it, etc.
